definitions.definition: A soft , glassy form of gypsum (chemical formula Ca S O 4 ·2 H 2 O ).
The anion Se O 3 derived from selenous acid ; any salt or ester of selenous acid.

main_definition: ( mineralogy ) A soft , glassy form of gypsum (chemical formula Ca S O 4 ·2 H 2 O ).
secondary_definitions: ( inorganic chemistry ) The anion Se O 3 derived from selenous acid ; any salt or ester of selenous acid.
